complaint.description: I'm getting really irritated to receive Covid related **** sms messages from MTN almost daily as well as the message below, of which I can not block the number. Their so called whatsapp number is a damn pathetic robot!! Not helpfull at all. And then the almost daily calls to upgrade.... But I guess, MTN will not even react to this complaint as per all other complaints!!! Every day message which I'm receiving:- Y'ello! Use your YelloBucks for Sportsmans Warehouse vouchers and make it a Summer to remember! Get your voucher now on the MTN App or dial *234#. T&Cs
complaint.suggestion: MTN should stop sending annoying SMS messages and improve their customer service.
